posts.post_title: WTB Mathewson, Johnson Portrait, Joss SGC 30 or 20
posts.post_content: Hi, Im looking to buy the following T206 cards in SGC 30 or 20: both Mathewson's, Johnson Portrait, and both Joss's. But, I would be intrested in any Hofer in 30 or 20. Thanks
